name: Fish Sticks
description:
First game ever, created in 30 days.

Destroy the corals to summon the turtle then assassinate him. Normal life when you're a fish assassin. Nothing personnel, kid.

Make sure to eat giblets dropped by slain fish or destroyed corals, it will be critical for your survival.

Follow the scent motive to find the corals to destroy, it works like hot and cold.

Read the info screen at the beginning.

https://twitter.com/DreamCoding
http://dreamcoding.tumblr.com/
